issue.title: [R] Enable GCS tests for Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17149](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17149). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-16879, I found the GCS tests were hanging in CI, but couldn't diagnose why. We should solve that and enable the tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17149?focusedCommentId=17569158) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
We likely will need to do ARROW-17150 first in order to debug this.
